Class UsersEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atlan.api.AbstractEndpoint
      • com.atlan.api.HeraclesEndpoint
        • com.atlan.api.UsersEndpoint
  • public class UsersEndpoint
extends HeraclesEndpoint
    API endpoints for interacting with Atlan's users.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        public UserResponse list​(java.lang.String filter,
                         java.lang.String sort,
                         boolean count,
                         int offset,
                         int limit)
                  throws AtlanException
        Retrieves a list of the users defined in Atlan.
        Parameters:
        filter - which users to retrieve
        sort - property by which to sort the results
        count - whether to return the total number of records (true) or not (false)
        offset - starting point for results to return, for paging
        limit - maximum number of results to be returned
        Returns:
        a list of users that match the provided criteria
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication issue

      • list

        public UserResponse list​(java.lang.String filter,
                         java.lang.String sort,
                         boolean count,
                         int offset,
                         int limit,
                         RequestOptions options)
                  throws AtlanException
        Retrieves a list of the users defined in Atlan.
        Parameters:
        filter - which users to retrieve
        sort - property by which to sort the results
        count - whether to return the total number of records (true) or not (false)
        offset - starting point for results to return, for paging
        limit - maximum number of results to be returned
        options - to override default client settings
        Returns:
        a list of users that match the provided criteria
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication issue

      • getByEmail

        public java.util.List<AtlanUser> getByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
                                     throws AtlanException
        Retrieves all users with email addresses that contain the provided email. (This could include a complete email address, in which case there should be at most a single item in the returned list, or could be a partial email address such as "@example.com" to retrieve all users with that domain in their email address.)
        Parameters:
        email - on which to filter the users
        Returns:
        all users whose email addresses contain the provided string
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any error during API invocation

      • getByEmail

        public java.util.List<AtlanUser> getByEmail​(java.lang.String email,
                                            RequestOptions options)
                                     throws AtlanException
        Retrieves all users with email addresses that contain the provided email. (This could include a complete email address, in which case there should be at most a single item in the returned list, or could be a partial email address such as "@example.com" to retrieve all users with that domain in their email address.)
        Parameters:
        email - on which to filter the users
        options - to override default client settings
        Returns:
        all users whose email addresses contain the provided string
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any error during API invocation

      • getByUsername

        public AtlanUser getByUsername​(java.lang.String user)
                        throws AtlanException
        Retrieves a user based on the username. (This attempts an exact match on username rather than a contains search.)
        Parameters:
        user - the username by which to find the user
        Returns:
        the user with that username
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any error during API invocation

      • getByUsername

        Parameters:
        user - the username by which to find the user
        options - to override default client settings
        Returns:
        the user with that username
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any error during API invocation

      • activate

        public UserMinimalResponse activate​(java.lang.String id)
                             throws AtlanException
        Enable this user to log into Atlan. This will only affect users who are deactivated, and will allow them to login again once completed.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier (GUID) of the user to activate
        Returns:
        the result of the update to the user
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any error during API invocation

      • activate

        public UserMinimalResponse activate​(java.lang.String id,
                                    RequestOptions options)
                             throws AtlanException
        Enable this user to log into Atlan. This will only affect users who are deactivated, and will allow them to login again once completed.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier (GUID) of the user to activate
        options - to override default client settings
        Returns:
        the result of the update to the user
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any error during API invocation

      • deactivate

        public UserMinimalResponse deactivate​(java.lang.String id)
                               throws AtlanException
        Prevent this user from logging into Atlan. This will only affect users who are activated, and will prevent them logging in once completed.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier (GUID) of the user to deactivate
        Returns:
        the result of the update to the user
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any error during API invocation

      • deactivate

                                      RequestOptions options)
                               throws AtlanException

        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier (GUID) of the user to deactivate
        options - to override default client settings
        Returns:
        the result of the update to the user
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any error during API invocation

      • update

        public UserMinimalResponse update​(java.lang.String id,
                                  AtlanUser user)
                           throws AtlanException
        Update a user. Note: you can only update users that have already signed up to Atlan. Users that are only invited (but have not yet logged in) cannot be updated.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier (GUID) of the user to update
        user - the details to update on the user
        Returns:
        basic details about the updated user
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication issue

      • update

                                  AtlanUser user,
                                  RequestOptions options)

        Parameters:

        user - the details to update on the user

        Returns:
        basic details about the updated user
        Throws:
